values:
It's been a pretty long time. lots of things have happened but it doesn't seem that anything is worthy enough to be mentioned.

so this year is the first year that i got everything i wanted. it was very exciting.

i even got some things that i wasn't expecting to get =) 

it is really sad that christmas is over though. but i'm really glad it came.i felt very much like i needed it. some things weren't the same though. i guess that can be expected.

sometimes i manage to get myself down but then at the oddest times i get the feeling that everything's going to be alright. and i guess maybe that's worth it. but i'm not too sure. 

i don't know. i think i'm just some silly kid.
but i'm not sure you would want to laugh at me because for some people who laugh, they'll be gunned and knifed and for others =) well they'll just have to wait.

and then of course there are the people that think i'm invisible. they're the ones who will be cut? 

but oh man, my legs and my shoulders hurt so bad today. grrrrr. that could be fixed =)



that's all i guess. maybe this was pointless. i don't know. maybe
i'm out. bye

my goodness, i haven't updated in such a long time. i would say that i feel bad. but i really don't

lots has happened. mostly happy stuff

i'm kinda sad the play is over because i really don't know what i'm going to do after school since the play is over.

i guess a safe bet is to say that i'm probably going to go home.

Halloween was probably the best halloween i've ever had. although erin's party last year was pretty good. that was one comfy recliner.

Thanksgiving was a really good one this year. i'm very excited that i didn't get yelled at. because i usually do. 

i really can't wait until Christmas. we already have our tree up. how crazy is that?

i'm also looking forward to Sunday, and i'm having my family guy party tomorrow. it should be fun.i'm excited

so erin, i've got a little bus.

and it goes like this...


that's pretty much it

bye

i loved my weekend. except for this morning when i cried.

since i did lots of smelling over the weekend. i have to ask 


What's your favorite all time smell??



mine is when someone goes outside when its cold and the way they smell when they come in. i also have another one. but thats none of your business.

so mom and kaylie decorated for halloween this morning and speaking of halloween, i dont know when im having my bash. it seems like that weekend is full. and it sucks because halloween is on sunday so... idk

this saturday is Sweetest Day. Seiously if there's anyone you want to thank or just let them know you appreciate them, or if theyve been having a bad time. SATURDAY IS THE TIME TO DO IT. im really serious about this. this is really the first time ive heard about it myself and i thinks its a cute little holiday.

so friday i had chelsea over and we just hung out and watched tv and the potterpuppetpals. then saturday was a kinda messed up night at the game. then sunday was my favorite day. except for the gay dancing in the morning. it was really really great. but then i freaked myself out this morning and it wasnt cool. so yea

strings tomorrow. i have a feeling im gonna bone it. and im sscared that the younger kids will whoop my ass because i havent picked up the violin since may. so yea. and i wont be home till about 8 thats gonna bone. 

and i rock the apache indian socks. im actually kind of proud of my report. it flows for the most part. and i think its alright for what it is. 

well w/e im out 
let me know about the smell thingy.


p.s. ive got this part of the song in my head and it sucks so yea im gonna write it out and maybe itll go away. i mean its not like its bad or anything its just there
so ...

i've gotta be honest, i've been waiting for you all my life. 

tada
love y'all
kissmeimtexan.

today was ok. i had a really bad headache. some caring and then excedrin helped lots. :)

i'm still very upset and worried about this whole uncle david moving thing. and i feel selfish that i have to be reassured that everything happens for a reason and that it will all be ok. 

i should really start trying to believe that. 

this weekend should be happenin. can't wait.

im tired. tomorrow is gonna be such a teaser. only because its thursday...

then friday!!!!!! partay!!!!!!

ok question of the day...
i got 7 nuts
how many do you get? 

or because no one really answered except for that hooty girl chelsea.

seriously what do you think of me?? 


i love you all. seriously.
this sexytexan is out for now cyall

ok so yesterday sucked really big balls. i'm not even going to elaborate. but today was fun i guess. 

if i had to break it down it would go like this... 

friday= great
saturday= bad balls 
sunday= alright/pretty good

i got to wear man pants!! and my god they are sooooooo comfy. i was all pimpin in these mothers. 

band tomorrow = most likely balls. 
then i have piano. i havent practiced at all for like 2 weeks. grr she's not gonna be happy. and then i'll feel really bad. 

1. she's old 
2. my mom is like paying for me to sight read every week.


after 2 months, my uncle david is leaving to move back to virginia. i'm going to cry. i love him more than anything and he's always someone i can go to. im going to miss the tubs, and all those little sunday trips. im gonna miss the late night talks on the front porch. im going to miss the laughs. grr im going to be a mess. 
i was so looking forward to christmas. it would've been the first that he'd be here for. i made him a shit load of ornaments for his tree because he doesn't have any. and i wanted to see his face when he opened them. and i was just so excited. and now im sad. like really sad. 
i guess the best i can do now is to right one of my letters. and let him go. because it's just for the best. and that's that. 
if he got aggravated after only 2 months... how did i manage for my whole life.i should just remember everything good that happened. and that he's not dying.
i just have to tell myself its all for the best and that everything will be ok.
is it really bad that i constantly need the assurance of everything being ok??

so i was thinking and wondering... 
 honest to god what do you think of me?? like seriously. 

(if it's really bad, try to be as gentle as possible)

this sexy texan is out for now.  i love you all. like for real.

im having a good time. idk. but i couldnt eat today and now i feel really sick... 

i think ill get over it soon. maybe maybe not. a little while ago it was the 13 year anniversary of my grandfather's death. so i was thinking about my grandmother and how different things would be if they didnt get married. they were like 11 years apart. so tell me... how much do you think age matters? 

idk. 

game tomorrow. hmmmmm idk it might be a good time. im not sure yet. 

i just hope there arent any amish death queens. 

cyall later.


p.s. kissmeimtexan

ok i was thinking and i though you might take interest in  certain things that i think if guys did this for me it would be amazing.

1. dance with me for no reason
2. flowers
3. show up at my house to make my day better

thats basically it. it would pretty much melt my heart. idk. w/e

so here's what im asking...
if you're a guy, how much of this would you do? 

if you're a girl,would you want a guy to do this for you?


oh and im having a movie party on the 8th. come if you think you're cool and if you're not a witch or gay.youre not allowed to just show up so youve gotta tell me in advance if you're going to come.

ok so i still need a hero. comment if you're interested


woohoo i just did a personal ad.


if you know any SMILFS let me know too

i feel like i know everything that it need right now. idk  but whatever ok so this is bothering me and i need to see what every one thinks...

so i heard that a priest told this to someone i know:

as soon as you leave your house, you have no connections whatsoever with the people that still live there or have moved out already. what do you guys think??

how could you lose all contact with your family after you leave?

This is like the first time ive updated since may. as you can see ive calmed down a bit. i want to see things from another perspective. and i know that the only perspective i have is my own.

ive been having really overwhelming dreams that just sweep my away in my own emotions. they seem so incredibly real and i can feel everything. the only way i can tell dreaming and reality apart is the light. its always brighter in real life.

school blows but its an odd way of putting me in this wierd regular routine.

marching band blew a big penis yesterday. military shouts
but it got better. i saw the most do-able guy last night. man if he didnt have a girlfriend id have his babies. ;)  i do have my eye on someone else though.

i guess im out. gotta go to the store and then do my homework.

cya

 

but....

i really need a hero :(

i needed this in here to put this in here to revive my journal. if you're going to do this please be honest and not anonymous. be a man/lesbyterian. have a ball.

1. Whats your name?:
2. Are we friends?:
3. How did we meet?:
4. Before we met, had you heard of me? If so, what did you hear?:
5. Describe me in one sentence:
6. What was your first impression of me?:
7. What's my middle name?:
8. What reminds you of me?:
9. What would you say my reputation is?:
10. What makes me happy?:
11. Who do I have a crush on?:
12. Do you think I'm attractive?:
13. Be honest, what is the worst thing you've heard someone say about me?:
14. Did you used to read my livejournal before you knew me?:
15. How would you describe me to someone?:
16. What's your favorite memory with me?:
17. What phrases do you think I say the most?:
18. What would you say is my worst feature (be honest)?:
19. What's the last thing I said to you?:
20. When was the first time you saw me?:
21. Do any songs remind you of me? (what are they):
22. Do you think we'll be friends in 3 years?:
23. Who do you think I should go out with?:
24. What makes me sad?:
25. What is my screen name?:
26. Say anything you've ever wanted to tell me:
27. Have I ever gotten your nipples?:
      If not, what's your favorite nipple experience?:
28. On a scale from 1 to 10 how loose do you think you are?:
      Or, pick someone else and tell me how loose they are.:
29. What's your favorite song?:
30. Should Doug's  name be continuously randomly shouted?:
31. Any question suggestions?:

thanks for doing this if you did. 
   ~*~ the nipple fairy~*~

I'm so tired.

I guess I know why I'll never have anyone to love me, 
I'll
    never
         be 
           pretty 
                 enough

but then... what is pretty enough?


 when's it going to be my turn?

I'm so lonely anymore. I'm sick of watching everyone have love and I'm stuck here waiting. It pisses me off. I can't wait till the end of may. I have not a clue what's going to make it so great but oh well. The person I want will be able to sit with me and won't need to say anything. which reminds me...
WHY CAN'T ANYONE EVER UNDERSTAND THAT I LIKE TO BE QUIET SOMETIMES? I DON'T ALWAYS HAVE TO TALK!! JESUS
just because I want to be quiet sometimes it doesn't mean I'm depressed. ok. that's enough of that no one has any idea. today was stupid i don't know what the deal is with school anymore. it seems so much longer when i count the days. i just can't wait until summer. 
anyway i'm out

May can't come soon enough I'll tell ya. Things just feel so out of whack it isn't funny. i can't wait for school to end and i just want... i dunno what i want. that's the sad part. erin really makes me think and that's really getting me tired. I'm so happy that she got the 95! CONGRATS!! lv ya soooooooooooooooooo much. too much to explain. but totally non lezzy. i don't understand how everyone gets a chance to see those eyes and i don't. but it's gotten better. i can even forget about him if someone doesn't mention him to me and thats so great.

well today was ok until i got home.then "the shit hit the fan" it is so common sense to do all your homework but for some reason my parents don't think so...in the case of my brother.which reminds me that i shoud get to mine.

i really don't know why i update. i doubt anyone reads this and no one has commented in a really long time and i dont think that they will so yea.

bye

Lately everything has been a disappointment lately. i hate it. i'm incredibly lonely and yea. so erin's party was on friday and it was really fun. we all yelled at her for turning off the movie like 5 seconds before it ended and it was a good part. then on saturday i went swimming and it was really cold and my ass froze but it was really fun.then i went to church this morning with really high hopes and by 10 they were bitterly smashed and by 10:30 there was no hope of regaining any of them. i just chilled for the rest of the day and then my old neighbors cam over. i haven't seen them for like a year and it was really cool to see them. hopefully this summer we'll be able to go down to their house in florida and visit. that would be really cool because i'd really like to see jenn. she is like the coolest adult ever and she's great. the last time we went there we talked about geezers and stuff. great fun. i loved it so much, i cried when we had to leave. o well i hate it that tomorrow's monday and that the next day's tuesday an so on. so i have a feeling that this week is going to suck.

well im out bye

anyway it's such a nice day today. too bad i have to do my homework in a little while. this week has been full of nasty ass. it got so bad on tuesday that i had to take a walk to be alone and think. that didn't even work because i developed a shadow. she kept following me wherever i went.the only times i actually got to be alone alone was the walk there and the walk home. things got a little better. 
i guess last night was ok. 

IM SO MAD BECAUSE I KNOW I KNEW THAT SONG AND I MESSED UP ANYWAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

i had a good time yesterday in the early afternoon. i planted flowers and weeded and i think my shoulders are a little sunburned

im out

Argh well yesterday was so much fun i mean i took noah,brenna,andria,and eamon to the library and then we went to eat then back to their house. we did a whole bunch of those "if you know what i mean" thingys and we were all like 

"it's going to be sunny outside if you know what i mean"
or



i can't wait for saturday. i get to go shopping with my mom and then im going to church.

today was really sucky the only good part about it was that it rained and i went to the store. then i came home and things got sucky again. dammit 

i need to sleep.

my weekend was pretty much the same as other weekends i mean i watched tv all shopped a little on saturday then went to elise's house. that was fun i got hit in the shoulder by chelsea. damn that hurt. i really felt that when my monsignor was commenting about boobilism yes many teenage girls succumb to anorexia and boobilism due to the pressures put on them by their parents.yea that was pretty much my sunday because then i went shopping a little more and i bought some flowers to plant to make up for last years lack of flowerness. but that was mostly due to my mom's arm and there was really nothing stopping me from weeding but hey.... it then became overrun with snakes and toads for the rest of the summer. but this time its gonna be alright. i'm feeling quite lonely lately. yes lonely and discarded. extremely i mean its like no one wants me EVER or at least hasn't within an excess of 6 months.im such a loser. idk ever since that night i had the o-so-perfect dream there hasn't been anything good that i could remember. how could i forget all the dreams i've had? it's kind of wierd. i'm kind of wierd. dave wore spandex today it really creeped me out. his arms almost looked.......womanly?... well i guess that would be creepy also. he wants to be a woman named davina.

davina the most womanly woman

like um...........the wierdest thing i guess it would be that if he gets to be more womanly than the girls at school. well maybe they aren't womanly, slutty is more like it but they tend to be feminine. maybe one day he might be beat up and that will make him straight. or at least get him to move.   o well i need to go shower. bye

well it's friday and i'm at home pretty much as usual  but hey what can you expect? i'm feeling kind of lonely and like a loser. i just can't seem to find anyone who's interested. not like i'm that wonderful of a person anyway or attractive. it makes me feel sort of left out everyone's around me with their someone and here i am, all alone and wishing and waiting and hoping. although... the other day something happened it was quite personal but it just brought my hopes up a bit and i actually felt like someone wanted to care for me it was quite wonderful. and when i say personal i mean like not sex or "sensual" stuff. but hey . i know it sounds  kind of corny but i just want someone that will hold me and give me my dance. a dance that is for no apparent reason at all. just on the spur of the moment when a beautiful song comes on, he'll take me up into his arms and dance with me and it will feel like i'm flying. YEA RIGHT  that's when i wake up and i have to go to school to be bored to death. although that would be extremely perfect. it really would be. o well i know that will never happen so whatever. on a better note, i got a 95 on mr. kreheley's quiz and hes like o this is one of your best efforts yet. IS THERE A REASON FOR THIS. is it gonna keep happening like forever and ever alleluia? i was the wierdest thing ever but i was really extremely happy about it. and i know i got 100 on mr. faust's quiz so eat that. i'm going to go day dream or read books where everything has a happy ending because i know i sure am not going that way.
goodbye
P.S. i heart you katie and erin and there's nothing that would ever change that and i would never take anything away from you.

Staying home alone on a Friday
Flat on the floor looking back on old love, or lack thereof
After all the crushes are faded and all my wishful thinking was wrong
I'm jaded and I hate it

Searching all my days just to find you
I'm not sure who I'm looking for
I'll know it when I see you
Until then, I'll hide in my bedroom
Staying up all night just to write a love song for no one

I could have met you in a sandbox
I could have passed you on the sidewalk
Could I have missed my chance and watched you walk away

I'm tired of being alone,so hurry up and get here
So tired of being alone, so hurry up and get here
You'll be so good
You'll be so good for me...

SHIT here you go elise.it's a live journal ta da. today was a bad day a real bad day. actually it's been about a bad 2 weeks and I really hate and mark didn't help at all. neither did erin. i was definately invisible. it was terrible. and mark had the NERVE to say he's sorry that everyone ive come across today has pissed me off in some way or another. he has no idea at all. and i told him that i would feel bad that i was mad at him but now i really don't at all. that's it here you are.

o katie thanks for listening
